item.title: Celery/Kombu MongoDB connection exception investigation log
item.description: Background The product component JobCenter uses Celery to implement an asynchronous task center, running both job-center-worker (celery worker) and job-center-scheduler (celery beat) processes, using MongoDB as the Backend to store messages, etc. (Celery has officially stated that it no longer maintains support for MongoDB). MongoDB is configured with ReplicaSet to ensure high availability. Recently, we encountered the problem of no free channel ids in Celery/Kombu. After troubleshooting, the issue was solved in this PR.
